title: Mad Tom a bedlams desires of peace or his Benedicities for distracted Englands restauration to her wits again. / By a constant, though unjust sufferer (now in prison) for his Majesties just regality, and his countreys liberty. SFWB.
author: Wortley, Francis, Sir, 1591-1652.
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
